verses.verse: These<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> Reuben,<WH7205> Simeon,<WH8095> Levi,<WH3878> Judah,<WH3063> Issachar,<WH3485> Zebulun,<WH2074>
Dan,<WH1835> Joseph,<WH3130> Benjamin,<WH1144> Naphtali,<WH5321> Gad,<WH1410> and Asher.<WH836>

The sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> [were] Er,<WH6147> Onan,<WH209> and Shelah;<WH7956> [these] three<WH7969> were born<WH3205> to him by Bath-shua the Canaanitess.<WH3669> And Er,<WH6147> Judah's first-born, was wicked<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> so He put<WH4191> him to death.<WH4191>
And Tamar<WH8559> his daughter-in-law bore<WH3205> him Perez<WH6557> and Zerah.<WH2226> Judah<WH3063> had five<WH2568> sons<WH1121> in all.<WH3605>
The sons<WH1121> of Perez<WH6557> [were] Hezron<WH2696> and Hamul.<WH2538>
And the sons<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> [were] Zimri,<WH2174> Ethan,<WH387> Heman,<WH1968> Calcol,<WH3633> and Dara;<WH1873> five<WH2568> of them in all.<WH3605>
And the son<WH1121> of Carmi<WH3756> [was] Achar,<WH5917> the troubler<WH5916> of Israel,<WH3478> who<WH834> violated<WH4603> the ban.<WH9172>
And the son<WH1121> of Ethan<WH387> [was] Azariah.<WH5838>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Hezron,<WH2696> who<WH834> were born<WH3205> to him [were] Jerahmeel,<WH3396> Ram,<WH7410> and Chelubai.<WH3621>

And Ram<WH7410> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Amminadab,<WH5992> and Amminadab<WH5992> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Nahshon,<WH5177> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Judah;<WH3063>
Nahshon<WH5177> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Salma,<WH8007> Salma<WH8007> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Boaz,<WH1162>
Boaz<WH1162> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Obed,<WH5744> and Obed<WH5744> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jesse;<WH3448>
and Jesse<WH3448> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Eliab<WH446> his first-born, then Abinadab<WH41> the second,<WH8145> Shimea<WH8092> the third,<WH7992>
Nethanel<WH5417> the fourth,<WH7243> Raddai<WH7288> the fifth,<WH2549>
Ozem<WH684> the sixth,<WH8345> David<WH1732> the seventh;<WH7637>
and their sisters<WH269> [were] Zeruiah<WH6870> and Abigail.<WH26> And the three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> of Zeruiah<WH6870> [were] Abshai,<WH52> Joab,<WH3097> and Asahel.<WH6214>
And Abigail<WH26> bore<WH3205> Amasa,<WH6021> and the father of Amasa<WH1> was Jether<WH6021> the Ishmaelite.<WH3500>

Now Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Hezron<WH2696> had<WH3205> sons<WH3205> by Azubah<WH5806> [his] wife,<WH802> and by Jerioth;<WH3408> and these<WH428> were her sons:<WH1121> Jesher,<WH3475> Shobab,<WH7727> and Ardon.<WH715>
When Azubah<WH5806> died,<WH4191> Caleb<WH3612> married<WH3947> Ephrath,<WH672> who bore<WH3205> him Hur.<WH2354>
And Hur<WH2354> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Uri,<WH221> and Uri<WH221> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Bezalel.<WH1212>

Afterward<WH310> Hezron<WH2696> went<WH935> in to the daughter<WH1323> of Machir<WH4353> the father of Gilead,<WH1> whom he married<WH1568> when he was sixty<WH3947> years<WH8346> old;<WH8141> and she bore<WH1121> him Segub.<WH3205>
And Segub<WH7687> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jair,<WH2971> who had<WH1961> twenty-three cities<WH5892> in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>

But Geshur<WH1650> and Aram<WH758> took<WH3947> the towns<WH2333> of Jair<WH2971> from them, with Kenath<WH7079> and its villages,<WH1323> [even] sixty<WH8346> cities.<WH5892> All<WH3605> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Machir,<WH4353> the father of Gilead.<WH1>
And after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Hezron<WH2696> in Caleb-ephrathah, Abijah,<WH29> Hezron's wife,<WH802> bore<WH3205> him Ashhur<WH806> the father of Tekoa.<WH1>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> the first-born of Hezron<WH2696> [were] Ram<WH7410> the first-born, then Bunah,<WH946> Oren,<WH767> Ozem,<WH684> [and] Ahijah.<WH281>
And Jerahmeel<WH3396> had<WH1961> another<WH312> wife,<WH802> whose name<WH8034> was Atarah;<WH5851> she was the mother<WH517> of Onam.<WH208>
And the sons<WH1121> of Ram,<WH7410> the first-born of Jerahmeel,<WH3396> were Maaz,<WH4619> Jamin,<WH3226> and Eker.<WH6134>
And the sons<WH1121> of Onam<WH208> were Shammai<WH8060> and Jada.<WH3047> And the sons<WH1121> of Shammai<WH8060> [were] Nadab<WH5070> and Abishur.<WH51>
And the name<WH8034> of Abishur's wife<WH802> [was] Abihail,<WH32> and she bore<WH3205> him Ahban<WH257> and Molid.<WH4140>
And the sons<WH1121> of Nadab<WH5070> [were] Seled<WH5540> and Appaim,<WH649> and Seled<WH5540> died<WH4191> without<WH3808> sons.<WH1121>
And the son<WH1121> of Appaim<WH649> [was] Ishi.<WH3469> And the son<WH1121> of Ishi<WH3469> [was] Sheshan.<WH8348> And the son<WH1121> of Sheshan<WH8348> [was] Ahlai.<WH304>
And the sons<WH1121> of Jada<WH3047> the brother<WH251> of Shammai<WH8060> [were] Jether<WH3500> and Jonathan,<WH3083> and Jether<WH3500> died<WH4191> without<WH3808> sons.<WH1121>
And the sons<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> [were] Peleth<WH6431> and Zaza.<WH2117> These<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel.<WH3396>
Now Sheshan<WH8348> had<WH1961> no<WH3808> sons,<WH1121> only<WH3588> <WH518> daughters.<WH1323> And Sheshan<WH8348> had an Egyptian<WH4713> servant<WH5650> whose name<WH8034> was Jarha.<WH3398>
And Sheshan<WH8348> gave<WH5414> his daughter<WH1323> to Jarha<WH3398> his servant<WH5650> in marriage,<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> him Attai.<WH6262>
And Attai<WH6262> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Nathan,<WH5416> and Nathan<WH5416> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Zabad,<WH2066>
and Zabad<WH2066> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Ephlal,<WH654> and Ephlal<WH654> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Obed,<WH5744>
and Obed<WH5744> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jehu,<WH3058> and Jehu<WH3058> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Azariah,<WH5838>
and Azariah<WH5838> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Helez,<WH2503> and Helez<WH2503> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Eleasah,<WH501>
and Eleasah<WH501> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Sismai,<WH5581> and Sismai<WH5581> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Shallum,<WH7967>
and Shallum<WH7967> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jekamiah,<WH3359> and Jekamiah<WH3359> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Elishama.<WH476>

Now the sons<WH1121> of Caleb,<WH3612> the brother<WH251> of Jerahmeel,<WH3396> [were] Mesha<WH4337> his first-born, who<WH1931> was the father of Ziph;<WH1> and his son<WH2128> was Mareshah,<WH1121> the father of Hebron.<WH4762>
And the sons<WH1121> of Hebron<WH9116> [were] Korah<WH7141> and Tappuah<WH9647> and Rekem<WH7552> and Shema.<WH8087>
And Shema<WH8087> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Raham,<WH7357> the father of Jorkeam;<WH1> and Rekem<WH3421> became<WH7552> the father<WH3205> of Shammai.<WH3205>
And the son<WH1121> of Shammai<WH8060> was Maon,<WH4584> and Maon<WH4584> [was] the father of Bethzur.<WH1>
And Ephah,<WH5891> Caleb's concubine,<WH6370> bore<WH3205> Haran,<WH9173> Moza,<WH4162> and Gazez;<WH1495> and Haran<WH9173> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Gazez.<WH1495>
And the sons<WH1121> of Jahdai<WH3056> [were] Regem,<WH7276> Jotham,<WH3147> Geshan,<WH1529> Pelet,<WH6404> Ephah,<WH5891> and Shaaph.<WH8174>
Maacah,<WH4601> Caleb's concubine,<WH6370> bore<WH3205> Sheber<WH7669> and Tirhanah.<WH8647>

She also bore<WH3205> Shaaph<WH8174> the father of Madmannah,<WH1> Sheva<WH4089> the father of Machbena<WH7724> and the father of Gibea;<WH1> and the daughter<WH4343> of Caleb<WH1> [was] Achsah.<WH1388>
These<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Caleb.<WH3612> The sons<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> the first-born of Ephrathah,<WH672> [were] Shobal<WH7732> the father of Kiriath-jearim,
Salma<WH8007> the father of Bethlehem<WH1> [and] Hareph<WH1035> the father of Beth-gader.
And Shobal<WH7732> the father of Kiriath-jearim had<WH1> sons:<WH1961> Haroeh,<WH1121> half<WH7204> of the Manahathites,<WH2677>

and the families<WH4940> of Kiriath-jearim: the Ithrites,<WH3505> the Puthites,<WH6336> the Shumathites,<WH8126> and the Mishraites;<WH4954> from these<WH428> came<WH3318> the Zorathites<WH6882> and the Eshtaolites.<WH848>
The sons<WH1121> of Salma<WH8007> [were] Bethlehem<WH1035> and the Netophathites,<WH5200> Atroth-beth-joab and half<WH2677> of the Manahathites,<WH9274> the Zorites.<WH6882>

And the families<WH4940> of scribes<WH9373> who lived<WH3427> at Jabez<WH3258> [were] the Tirathites,<WH8654> the Shimeathites,<WH8101> [and] the Sucathites.<WH7756> Those<WH1992> are the Kenites<WH7017> who came<WH935> from Hammath,<WH9150> the father of the house<WH1> of Rechab.<WH1004>
